scripts.test:clean: rm -rf report.json results.xml videos screenshot playwright-report output test-results
scripts.test:webkit: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/ui/*.spec.ts --headed --project=webkit && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:api: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/api/*.spec.ts --project=webkit && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:chromium: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/ui/*.spec.ts --headed --project=chromium && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:firefox: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/ui/*.spec.ts --headed --project=firefox && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:all: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/**/*.spec.ts --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.ui:debug: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/ui/*.spec.ts --headed --project=firefox --ui
scripts.api:debug: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test tests/api/*.spec.ts --ui
